course_description: This introductory art course offers a comprehensive exploration of both 2D and 3D media, providing students of all levels and artistic backgrounds with a multifaceted entry point into contemporary art practices. Throughout the course, students will delve into various methods of making and thinking.
sections: Class Nbr: 3241, Section #: 1, Type: LAB, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 10a-12p, Instructor: A. Putt, Status: Open
